Here are a few recommendations based on your preferences:

- "The Santa Clause 2" (1998) ) - A sequel to the popular film "The Santa Clause." The story revolves around Scott Calvin's attempts to become a real Santa Claus, but his attempts often fail. In this sequel, Calvin finds himself in a predicament when he is offered the chance to be the real Santa Claus again. But this time, he has encountered a new obstacle - a woman named Karen who claims to be Santa Claus and believes that Calvin's attempt to be Santa Claus was an attempt to steal his job as Santa Claus. Calvin must find a way to convince Karen that her claim to be Santa Claus is false and that she should not be trying to take over Calvin's job as Santa Claus. In the end, Calvin manages to convince Karen that her claim to be Santa Claus is false and that she should not be trying to take over Calvin's job as Santa Claus. The movie has a good plot and well-developed characters. It is a must-watch for fans of Christmas movies.

The film stars Ella Joyce, Blair Underwood, Blair Underwood, Jada Pinkett Smith, Jada Pinkett Smith, Dr. Dre, Vivica A. Fox, Vivica A. Fox, Kimberly Elise.
